title: Conjure Woodland Beings
content:
the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Conjure Woodland Beings Information

Description: Conjure a dryad to fight alongside you. She can use Nature's Step, Entangle enemies, and Summon a wood woad. Level: Lvl 4 spell School: Conjuration School Casting Time: Action Range: 18m Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: No
